column2: DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
3 primary tumors, 1 on left forehead, 1 on right neck, 1 on back of head.
Thoracic cavity full of lung/heart mets.
Skull was intact, brain appeared normal.
2 cryogenic tube of tumor tissue was frozen down.
